name: overflow-universal-leads-scraper
description: A universal, config-driven scraper for extracting rich lead data, personas, and messaging signals from websites.

startUrls.title: Start URLs
startUrls.description: List of URLs to begin crawling from.

campaignMode.title: Campaign Mode
campaignMode.description: Optional campaign preset to adjust classification and routing (e.g., 'music', 'coaches', 'venues').

maxConcurrency.title: Max Concurrency
maxConcurrency.description: Max number of pages to crawl in parallel.
